mapper.insert: insert into tbl_visit_number (visitno, year, month, day, day_of_week, visit_number) values (seq_visit_number_visitno.nextval, #{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{day_of_week, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visit_number})
mapper.select: select visit_number from tbl_visit_number where year = #{year} and month = #{month} and day = #{day}
select count(*) from tbl_visit_number where year = #{year} and month = #{month} and day = #{day}
